description: This file implements utility functions for the SLAP Access Manager component, including conversions between different parameter list and variable representations across environments (GOA, UOA, LOA), and creation/destruction of object wrappers. It contains functions like SlapAmoGoaToUoaParamList, SlapAmoUoaToGoaParamList, SlapAmoGoaToUoaVariable, etc., primarily for environment-specific object and variable transformations.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS SlapAmoGoaToUoaParamList(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,SLAP_PARAMETER_LIST * param_list)
methods.description: Converts a parameter list from GOA to UOA environment by invoking GoaToUoaVariable on each parameter.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS SlapAmoUoaToGoaParamList(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,SLAP_PARAMETER_LIST * param_list,ANSC_HANDLE hSlapGoaRtc)
methods.description: Converts a parameter list from UOA to GOA environment by invoking UoaToGoaVariable on each parameter.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS SlapAmoGoaToUoaVariable(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,SLAP_VARIABLE * slap_var)
methods.description: Converts a variable from GOA to UOA environment, transforming object references within the variable.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS SlapAmoUoaToGoaVariable(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,SLAP_VARIABLE * slap_var,ANSC_HANDLE hSlapGoaRtc)
methods.description: Converts a variable from UOA to GOA environment, wrapping or unwrapping object references appropriately.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS SlapAmoGoaToLoaParamList(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,SLAP_PARAMETER_LIST * param_list)
methods.description: Converts a parameter list from GOA to LOA environment, if the _ANSC_SLAP_LPC_ macro is defined.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS SlapAmoLoaToGoaParamList(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE lpc_party_addr,SLAP_PARAMETER_LIST * param_list,ANSC_HANDLE hSlapGoaRtc)
methods.description: Converts a parameter list from LOA to GOA environment, if the _ANSC_SLAP_LPC_ macro is defined.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS SlapAmoGoaToLoaVariable(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,SLAP_VARIABLE * slap_var)
methods.description: Converts a variable from GOA to LOA environment, wrapping object references in the LOA context.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS SlapAmoLoaToGoaVariable(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE lpc_party_addr,SLAP_VARIABLE * slap_var,ANSC_HANDLE hSlapGoaRtc)
methods.description: Converts a variable from LOA to GOA environment, unwrapping object references from LOA objects.
